sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')+LEVEL-1,'YYYYMMDD') AS DAY ,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')+LEVEL-1,'DD')) AS DAY_NM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE(#STDR_YM#||'01','YYYYMMDD')+LEVEL-1 <= LAST_DAY(#STDR_YM#||'01')

SELECT DEPT_CODE ,(SELECT NVL(SFSAL_GETDEPTNM_01(DEPT_CODE), SFHRM_GET_DEPTNM(DEPT_CODE, '0')) FROM DUAL) AS DEPT_NM ,EMPNO ,EMPNM ,JSSFC_SE AS JSSFC_SE /*직종*/ ,HR_CLSF_SE AS CLSF_SE /*직급*/ ,RSPOFC_SE AS RSPOFC_SE /*직책*/ ,(SELECT SFHRM_GET_OFCPSCD(EMPNO, JSSFC_SE, HR_CLSF_SE, ECNY_DE) FROM DUAL) AS OFCPS_SE /*직위*/
,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY1 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME1 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME1 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME1 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME1 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME1 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME1
,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY2 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME2 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME2 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME2 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME2 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME2 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '02','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME2
,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY3 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME3 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME3 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME3 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME3 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME3 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '03','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME3
,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY4 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME4 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME4 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME4 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME4 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME4 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '04','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME4

,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY26 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME26 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME26 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME26 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME26 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME26 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '26','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME26
,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY27 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME27 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME27 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME27 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME27 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME27 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '27','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME27
,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS DAY28 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS ATT_TIME28 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS LVF_TIME28 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_ETIME28 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS EDC_BTIME28 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS GG_TIME28 ,SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '28','YYYYMMDD')) AS JT_TIME28
,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS DAY29 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS ATT_TIME29 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS LVF_TIME29 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS EDC_ETIME29 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS EDC_BTIME29 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS GG_TIME29 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('29','30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '29','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS JT_TIME29
,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS DAY30 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS ATT_TIME30 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS LVF_TIME30 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS EDC_ETIME30 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS EDC_BTIME30 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS GG_TIME30 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('30','31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '30','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS JT_TIME30
,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('0', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS DAY31 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('1', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS ATT_TIME31 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('2', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS LVF_TIME31 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('3', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS EDC_ETIME31 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('4', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS EDC_BTIME31 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('5', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS GG_TIME31 ,Case When To_Char(Last_Day(TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') In ('31') Then SFHRM_GET_WORKTIME('6', EMPNO, TO_DATE(#STDR_YM# || '31','YYYYMMDD')) Else Null End AS JT_TIME31
FROM TBHRM_HR_MASTR WHERE STTUS_SE = '000' /*재직중인 사원*/ AND JSSFC_SE NOT IN ('000', '005') /*직종 임원(000), 기간제(005) 제외*/
AND (SELECT SFHRM_GET_OFCPSCD(EMPNO, JSSFC_SE, HR_CLSF_SE, ECNY_DE) FROM DUAL) = #OFCPS_SE#
AND DEPT_CODE = #DEPT_CODE#
AND EMPNM LIKE '%' || #EMPNM# || '%'
ORDER BY DEPT_CODE, EMPNO
